verses.name: Ezekiel 16:19
verses.text: My meat also which I gave thee, fine flour, and oil, and honey, wherewith I fed thee, thou hast even set it before them for a sweet savour: and thus it was, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:20
verses.text: Moreover thou hast taken thy sons and thy daughters, whom thou hast borne unto me, and these hast thou sacrificed unto them to be devoured. Is this of thy whoredoms a small matter,

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:21
verses.text: That thou hast slain my children, and delivered them to cause them to pass through the fire for them?
